mapper.select: select id,avatar,tag_name as tagName from ms_tag where id in (select tag_id from ms_article_tag where article_id =#{ArticleId})
select `art`.tag_id as id,t.tag_name as tagName t.avatar as avatar from ms_article_tag art RIGHT JOIN ms_tag t ON `art`.tag_id =t.id GROUP BY art.tag_id ORDER BY count(art.tag_id) DESC LIMIT #{limit}
